headline: Occidental Jumps as $5.8 Billion Debt Cut and Dividend Hike Impress Investors
summary: Yesterday, the question was whether Occidental Petroleum (NYSE: OXY) could translate production outperformance into meaningful earnings momentum despite weakening crude prices. Warren Buffett’s favorite oil company delivered a 67% EPS beat after the bell, and this morning shares are trading at $51.70, up 13.65% over the past week and 25.73% year to date. headline: These Stocks Are Today’s Movers: Carvana, DoorDash, Figma, Etsy, eBay, Walmart, and More
summary: STOCKSTOWATCHTODAY BLOG  Stock futures pointed lower Thursday with investors watching rising oil prices amid tensions with Iran.  These stocks were making moves in the premarket session:  Carvana fell 17% after after the used-car dealer best known for its auto vending machines reported fourth-quarter adjusted earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, and amortization of $511 million, below analysts’ consensus of $541 million.

headline: Occidental Stock Jumps 10%. It’s Not Just About Oil Prices.
summary: Occidental Petroleum stock surged early Thursday after its fourth-quarter earnings beat expectations.  The oil and gas producer’s shares rose 10% to $51.82 in early trading, after it published earnings late Wednesday.  Its peers were also up early Thursday—as oil prices climbed around 2% due to ongoing tensions between the U.S. and Iran—but by a smaller margin.

raw.headline: Occidental Stock Jumps 10%. It’s Not Just About Oil Prices.

Its peers were also up early Thursday—as oil prices climbed around 2% due to ongoing tensions between the U.S. and Iran—but by a smaller margin.

headline: Etsy to sell Depop to eBay, Deere & Occidental beat on earnings
summary: Morning Brief host Julie Hyman takes a look at some of Thursday morning's trending tickers and stories. Deere (DE) stock is on the rise after the company beat first quarter estimates and boosted its annual profit guidance. Occidental (OXY) stock is also rising, beating fourth quarter earnings expectations. Etsy (ETSY) stock is surging after the company announced it is selling its secondhand clothing platform Depop to eBay (EBAY) for $1.2 billion. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: Occidental Stock Jumps 6%. It’s Not Just About Oil Prices.
summary: Occidental Petroleum stock jumped around 6% ahead of the open Thursday after its fourth-quarter earnings beat expectations.  The oil and gas producer’s shares rose 5.8% to $49.85 in premarket trading, after it published earnings late Wednesday.  Its peers were also up early Thursday—as oil prices climbed around 1.5% due to ongoing tensions between the U.S. and Iran—but by a smaller margin.
